fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Study a player's trade during the day.
- Use one of your abilities on any target. 1 Use, also takes a use for the ability you chose for this.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of the night, you will get one use of the first ability of the player you studied. If they have none, you will be notified of this.
- You may not study the trade of unique roles, nor study a player's trade multiple times.
- You will not be charged a study use if the ability fails.
